Title: MyGoV corona helpdesk
Notes: Chatbot from ministry of health answering COVID-19 questions

Title: WHO health alert chatbot
Notes: Free to use WHO chatbot which has been designed to answer questions from the public about Coronavirus. Text 'hi' to start.

Title: CoViD-19 Karnataka: Sahaya Group
Notes: A platform to dicuss about CoViD19 in Karnataka. Run by the Dept of Info and Public Relations - Govt of Karnataka.

Title: CoViD-19 Karnataka State Channel
Notes: Information channel of DIPR - Govt. of Karnataka for accurate info.

Title: CoViD-19 Kar Bot
Notes: A bot which provides common information about COVID-19

Title: GoK Direct
Notes: Gives updates on of COVID-19 infection in state

Title: COVID-19 Kerala Official
Notes: Govt. of Kerala initiative for verified info
